title: Please help :) I have spent weeks looking for this font!
content:
I can't seem to find this guy, I've searched modern/retro/thickness/tried everything. I would greatly appreciate any feedback and will do all I can to return the favor!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [findme.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822104252/http:/typophile.com/files/findme.png) | 27 KB |
author: seanlebeck

comments.content: The font is a butchered Helvetica rip-off called Harabara that I’d try to steer clear of. The effect—duplicating each letter in the same colour as the background—is obviously independent of the typeface.
thank you so much for your reply i greatly appreciate it. You really know your stuff :)
